title: Presence Practices
subtitle: Learning to actually be here
description: Most of us live in the past or future, rarely inhabiting the present. This course offers practical techniques for cultivating genuine presence—not as a spiritual achievement, but as a way of being more fully alive.

modules.title: Obstacles to Presence
modules.description: What pulls you out of the moment

modules.title: Body-Based Presence
modules.description: Using the body as an anchor to now

whatYouLearn: Recognize what habitually pulls you away
Use the body to anchor in the present
Develop presence as a way of being

questions.question: What is presence?
options: Full awareness of and engagement with this moment

questions.question: What commonly pulls us out of presence?
options: Rumination about past, worry about future, compulsive thinking, and numbing

questions.question: Why is the body useful for cultivating presence?
options: The body is always in the present moment—you can't feel yesterday

questions.question: What does presence in relationship involve?
options: Full attention, listening without planning response, sensing the other person

questions.question: How can presence be practiced in daily activities?
options: Bringing full attention to ordinary activities—eating, walking, working
It can't - daily life is too busy

questions.question: What makes presence sustainable?
options: Regular practice that rewires default patterns of attention
